Another question, what does this loop do? <https://github.com/JuliaReinforcementLearning/ReinforcementLearningEnvironments.jl/blob/master/src/environments/wrappers/StateOverriddenEnv.jl#L21|https://github.com/JuliaReinforcementLearning/ReinforcementLearningEnvironments.jl/blob/master/src/environments/wrappers/StateOverriddenEnv.jl#L[…]1>
```for f in vcat(RLBase.ENV_API, RLBase.MULTI_AGENT_ENV_API)
    if f ∉ (:state,)
        @eval RLBase.$f(x::StateOverriddenEnv, args...; kwargs...) =
            $f(x.env, args...; kwargs...)
    end
end```
Is this a macro?

elements.text: Another question, what does this loop do?

text: It forward APIs defined in RLBase to the inner env. This part of code can be simplified though...
